name: Averting Adversities
description:
"To interview those people that almost got their future robbed... Can't say I'm not interested."

**Warning: The VN tackles issues that might be sensitive to some. Please be advised.**

Synopsis 

Lead the journalism club as you conduct interviews with victims of potential crimes and disasters and forge bonds while doing so.  Ask the right questions and shape the future of your club and help your peers overcome the adversities they're facing.
